attributes.action: 1. Stop all BIA raids on Chinese catering businesses 2. Work with the Chinese community to resolve its problem of skill shortages 3. Regularise undocumented migrant workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "1. Stop all BIA raids on Chinese catering businesses 2. Work with the Chinese community to resolve its problem of skill shortages 3. Regularise undocumented migrant workers."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20140


Prime Minister's Office
